title: Why does no one play galio?
body:
i've just started playing galio jungle and its ridiculously awesome. he has awesome mobility with his E, his Q can aoe entire jungle camps for damage and he has mad sustain with his W (i dont even take health pots into jg just mana pots) and his ult is just awesome for damage and stopping enemies from escaping with its taunt

maybe im just delusional but im loving it

replies.body: Galio is my main support tank but he only works with some ADC's e.g. MF, Ashe, Twitch and especially Kalista (ult combo is amazing). I build full tank with {{item:3401}} {{item:3268}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3065}} {{item:2045}} ({{item:3075}}  or {{item:3102}} depending on enemy team damage). FOTM yourself when u ult for extra AoE damage. He probably aint played because if you or your team fall behind, it is very hard to survive your ult and tank the damage from it.
I play galio mofo, play him with kali, she throws you in and you ult easy win

He's just like yorick good in a particular team but now that teams are starting to become ap like nidalee jung, lulu- lissandra- moakai top, ap mids and support like morgana, annie. I would say his a strong pick right now
{{champion:3}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:3}}

Pretty sure the main reason he fell out for a bit was the Chalice increase in cost (up to 1000) as it always was core on him.

He never has been full on popular however.
Chalice is now 900 gold, have fun :)

I love that with Galio, if you get hit by a spell and the enemy has Liandry's Torment, you just put on your shield and you'll get healed by the burning. Makes running into Teemo Shrooms actually helpful.
lol didnt know i could heal off teemo shrooms. good to know in case i have to face satan

I used to love playing Galio, though I don't have my old account anymore.
If you can farm top lane or jungle well enough, and mix your build into a tanky-AP {{champion:3}} , then you should have some fun ;)

There are better picks really...
But you play who you love to play, theres nothing wrong with that, and if you're having success then keep it up!

All I can say is that Riot feels that Galio's auto attacks are lame, so they're gonna rework him in that area for sure...
I actually like playing galio, but hes not played because - lacks damage compared to other mids, damage falls off hard late game, short range. Also being melee is awkward.
